entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
